item.title: Learning Chinese
item.description: I’ve been learning Chinese on and off… forever. Well, at least I managed to keep it going and accumulate quite a lot of vocabulary.

item.title: 小猪佩奇
item.description: Peppa Pig subtitles to study on the go. Another benefit of having these 字幕 on the web is that I can take advantage of Zhongwen Chinese Popup Dictionary, a Chrome extension.

item.title: 泥坑
item.description: 今天 下雨 了 ， 所以 佩奇 和 乔治 不能 在 外面 玩儿 。 “ 爸爸 ， 现在 雨停 了 ， 我们 能 出去玩 吗 ？”
